Package org.apache.wayang.core.platform

Class ConjunctiveBreakpoint

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.platform.ConjunctiveBreakpoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
Breakpoint
public class ConjunctiveBreakpoint extends Object implements Breakpoint
Breakpoint implementation that disrupts execution if all aggregated Breakpoints request a disruption. However, if no Breakpoint conjuncts are set up, then it will never break.
